Natsu Kaze (Summer Cold) [spoiler]Makito briefly returns to his hometown from his university to visit a summer festival with his childhood friend Kanon, but when he catches a cold the plans are derailed. Rather than attend the festival by herself, Kanon comes to nurse Makito while wearing her summer yukata. [/spoiler]
